definition: a hidden storage space (for money or provisions or weapons), to save up as for future use
details:
noun
- a hidden storage space (for money or provisions or weapons)
- (computer science) RAM memory that is set aside as a specialized buffer storage that is continually updated
= synonyms: memory cache
- a secret store of valuables or money
= synonyms: hoard, stash
verb
- to save up as for future use
= example: to save up as for future use
= synonyms: hoard, stash, lay away, hive up, squirrel away
